UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: CATH-2-derived antimicrobial peptide inhibits multidrug-resistant Escherichia coli infection in chickens
Literature.Author: Hao S, Shi W, Chen L, Kong T, Wang B, Chen S, Guo X

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MBC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=2-8µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MBC=2-8µg/ml)
